mapper.select: SELECT COUNT_NUMBER.NEXTVAL FROM dual
select count(food_no) from food
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food (food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_sale, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored) VALUES (#{foodNo}, #{sellerEmail}, #{foodCatANo}, #{foodCatBNo}, #{foodCatCNo}, #{foodName}, #{foodQuant}, #{foodExpiryDate}, #{foodSale}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodCarbo}, #{foodProtein}, #{foodFat}, #{foodCal}, #{foodSize}, #{foodOriginal}, #{foodStored})
mapper.select: SELECT food_cat_c_no, food_cat_c_name FROM food_cat_c
SELECT food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_cat_a_name FROM food_cat_a WHERE food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo} and food_cat_b_no = #{foodCatBNo}
SELECT food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_cat_b_name FROM food_cat_b WHERE food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE food SET FOOD_CAT_A_NO = #{foodCatANo}, FOOD_CAT_B_NO = #{foodCatBNo}, FOOD_CAT_C_NO = #{foodCatCNo}, FOOD_NAME = #{foodName}, FOOD_QUANT = #{foodQuant}, FOOD_EXPIRY_DATE = #{foodExpiryDate}, FOOD_SALE = #{foodSale}, FOOD_PRICE = #{foodPrice}, FOOD_CARBO = #{foodCarbo}, FOOD_PROTEIN = #{foodProtein}, FOOD_FAT = #{foodFat}, FOOD_CAL = #{foodCal}, FOOD_SIZE = #{foodSize}, FOOD_ORIGINAL = #{foodOriginal}, FOOD_STORED = #{foodStored} WHERE FOOD_NO = #{foodNo}
mapper.select: SELECT food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_sale, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored FROM food WHERE seller_email = #{sellerEmail} order by food_no

SELECT * FROM food WHERE food_no in ( SELECT DISTINCT food_no FROM pro_food_pay pfp, pro_food_order pfo WHERE pfp.pro_food_order_receiver_no = pfo.pro_food_order_receiver_no AND pfp.member_email = #{memberEmail} UNION SELECT DISTINCT food_no FROM food_pay fp, food_order fo WHERE fp.food_order_receiver_no = fo.food_order_receiver_no AND fp.member_email = #{memberEmail} )

SELECT food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_sale, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored FROM food WHERE food_no = #{foodNo}
select * from food

SELECT food_no, f.seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_sale, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored, sa.store_name, sa.store_telphone, sa.store_addr FROM food f, seller_application sa WHERE f.seller_email = sa.seller_email order by food_no

SELECT food_no, f.seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_sale, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored, sa.store_name, sa.store_telphone, sa.store_addr FROM food f, seller_application sa WHERE f.seller_email = sa.seller_email and f.food_no = #{foodNo}

SELECT distinct f.food_no, f.seller_email, f.food_cat_a_no, f.food_cat_b_no, f.food_cat_c_no, f.food_name, f.food_quant, f.food_expiry_date, f.food_sale, f.food_price, f.food_carbo, f.food_protein, f.food_fat, f.food_size, f.food_original, f.food_stored, sa.store_name, sa.store_telphone, sa.store_addr FROM PRO_FOOD_ORDER pfo, pro_food_pay pfp, food f, seller_application sa WHERE pfo.MEMBER_EMAIL = pfp.MEMBER_EMAIL AND pfo.food_no = f.food_no AND f.seller_email = sa.SELLER_EMAIL AND pfp.member_email = #{memberEmail} order by food_no
select count(food_review_no) from food_review

SELECT fr.food_review_no, fr.member_email, fr.food_no, fr.seller_email, fr.food_cat_a_no, fr.food_cat_b_no, fr.food_cat_c_no, food_review_regdate, food_review_food_name, food_review_title, food_review_score, food_review_comment, food_review_size, food_review_original, food_review_stored, food_review_answer_no, food_review_answer_content, food_review_answer_regdate FROM food_review fr, food_review_answer fra WHERE fr.food_review_no = fra.food_review_no(+) AND fr.food_no = #{foodNo} ORDER BY food_review_regdate
mapper.update: UPDATE food_review SET food_review_no = #{foodReviewNo}, member_email = #{memberEmail}, food_no = #{foodNo}, seller_email = #{sellerEmail}, food_cat_a_no = #{foodCatANo}, food_cat_b_no = #{foodCatBNo}, food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo}, food_review_regdate = #{foodReviewRegdate}, food_review_food_name = #{foodReviewFoodName}, food_review_title = #{foodReviewTitle}, food_review_score = #{foodReviewScore}, food_review_comment = #{foodReviewComment}, food_review_size = #{foodReviewSize}, food_review_original = #{foodReviewOriginal}, food_review_stored = #{foodReviewStored} WHERE food_review_no = #{foodReviewNo}

UPDATE food_review_answer SET food_review_no = #{foodReviewNo}, member_email = #{memberEmail}, food_no = #{foodNo}, seller_email = #{sellerEmail}, food_review_answer_no= #{foodReviewAnswerNo}, food_cat_a_no = #{foodCatANo}, food_cat_b_no = #{foodCatBNo}, food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo}, food_review_answer_content = #{foodReviewAnswerContent}, food_review_answer_regdate = #{foodReviewAnswerRegdate} WHERE food_review_answer_no = #{foodReviewAnswerNo}
mapper.select: SELECT food_review_no, member_email, food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_report_title, food_report_content, food_report_writer, food_report_regdate FROM food_review_report ORDER BY food_report_regdate

SELECT food_review_no, member_email, food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_report_title, food_report_content, food_report_writer, food_report_regdate FROM food_review_report WHERE food_report_regdate = #{foodReportRegdate}

SELECT diet_record_no, member_email, dr.food_nutrient_name, diet_record_regdate, diet_record_time, food_quantity, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal FROM diet_record dr, food fd WHERE dr.food_nutrient_name = fd.food_name AND member_email = #{memberEmail} AND diet_record_regdate = #{dietRecordRegdate} union SELECT diet_record_no, member_email, dr.food_nutrient_name, diet_record_regdate, diet_record_time, food_quantity, fn.FOOD_NUTRIENT_CARBO, FOOD_NUTRIENT_PROTEIN, FOOD_NUTRIENT_FAT, FOOD_NUTRIENT_CAL FROM diet_record dr, FOOD_NUTRIENT fn WHERE dr.food_nutrient_name = fn.food_nutrient_name AND member_email = #{memberEmail} AND diet_record_regdate = #{dietRecordRegdate} order by food_nutrient_name
select DISTINCT food_nutrient_cat_name from food_nutrient

select rownum, A.* from (select fo.food_order_name, fo.food_order_quant, fp.food_pay_price, fp.food_pay_date, f.FOOD_QUANT, fo.seller_email from food_pay fp, food_order_receiver forr, food_order fo, food f where fp.food_order_receiver_no = forr.food_order_receiver_no AND forr.food_order_receiver_no = fo.food_order_receiver_no AND fo.FOOD_NO = f.FOOD_NO AND fo.seller_email = #{sellerEmail} AND fp.food_pay_date LIKE #{foodPayDate} union select pfo.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_NAME, pfo.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_QUANT, pfp.PRO_FOOD_PAY_PRICE, pfp.PRO_FOOD_PAY_DATE, f.FOOD_QUANT, pfo.seller_email from pro_food_pay pfp, pro_food_order_receiver pfor, pro_food_order pfo, food f where pfp.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_RECEIVER_NO = pfor.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_RECEIVER_NO AND pfor.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_RECEIVER_NO = pfo.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_RECEIVER_NO AND pfo.FOOD_NO = f.FOOD_NO AND pfo.SELLER_EMAIL = #{sellerEmail} AND pfp.pro_food_pay_date LIKE #{foodPayDate} order by food_order_quant desc) A

select rownum, A.* from (select fo.food_order_name, fo.food_order_quant, fp.food_pay_price, fp.food_pay_date, f.FOOD_QUANT, fo.seller_email from food_pay fp, food_order_receiver forr, food_order fo, food f where fp.food_order_receiver_no = forr.food_order_receiver_no AND forr.food_order_receiver_no = fo.food_order_receiver_no AND fo.FOOD_NO = f.FOOD_NO AND fo.seller_email = #{sellerEmail} AND fp.food_pay_date LIKE #{foodPayDate} union select pfo.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_NAME, pfo.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_QUANT, pfp.PRO_FOOD_PAY_PRICE, pfp.PRO_FOOD_PAY_DATE, f.FOOD_QUANT, pfo.seller_email from pro_food_pay pfp, pro_food_order_receiver pfor, pro_food_order pfo, food f where pfp.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_RECEIVER_NO = pfor.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_RECEIVER_NO AND pfor.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_RECEIVER_NO = pfo.PRO_FOOD_ORDER_RECEIVER_NO AND pfo.FOOD_NO = f.FOOD_NO AND pfo.SELLER_EMAIL = #{sellerEmail} AND pfp.pro_food_pay_date LIKE #{foodPayDate} order by food_order_quant desc) A
select * from food_order where SELLER_EMAIL = #{sellerEmail} order by food_order_receiver_no
select FOOD_NO,ROUND(avg(FOOD_REVIEW_SCORE)) as avg_review_score from food_review group by food_no order by food_no
